trees.binary
Class BinaryNode<E>

java.lang.Object
  trees.binary.BinaryNode<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the element to search for
public class BinaryNode<E>
extends java.lang.Object

Binary node is the class having the elements and the characteristics of the Tree nodes used in binary search trees and avl trees

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Mahmoud Mahmoud Eweda
